Introducing millions of kids to computer programming.

Strategic direction, web and social presence, public relations, curriculum development, fundraising, finances, volunteer recruitment and training, partnership development, operations, and most importantly: helping kids learn to code.
Developing service- and technology-based offerings for commercial and industrial facilities. Using data and analytics to keep the lights on, save money, and make life easier for building managers.

Helping commercial and multifamily buildings save energy by making it easy to see their data and make sense of it. I am building out our commercial platform and developing analytics to identify energy improvement opportunities.

Responsible for vision and product definition for next-generation technologies for demand response, including streamlined user experience, modern web design, mobile strategy, backend architecture, integration with smart grid systems, and in-building gateways.

summary: After a decade of interesting jobs (marketing, product management, consulting, strategy for big and small companies), I found my passion: helping young people learn technology. I started Prenda with the goal of bringing free computer programming clubs to libraries all over the U.S. and (eventually) to change the way we think about education.
